text: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ

translation.en: Then how [will it be] when the angels take them in death, striking their faces and their backs
translation.id: Maka bagaimana (nasib mereka) apabila malaikat (maut) mencabut nyawa mereka, memukul wajah dan punggung mereka
